title: I Don't "Ship" Retsuko & Haida
body:
Many fellow fans of Aggretsuko “ship” the main character, Retsuko, and her enamored co-worker, Haida. Personally, I do not.

When we first meet Haida, we are not even sure that the two are friends. Instead, he gives her a hard time. This could be out of friendship, but it is portrayed as just adding to her work stress.

When Retsuko approaches Haida about marriage, it is not out of affection for him, but a simple husband-hunt. She hates work and wants someone to get her out of it. When Haida makes it clear that he expects she would still work, even if they married, she just walks off, leaving him talking to himself.

The show eventually reveals them to be casual “work” friends, but not particularly close. Haida knows her pretty well, but is too smitten to talk to her about his feelings. She remains blithely unaware. When she finally does learn, she makes him be explicit with her, and then turns him down.

Fenneko and Haida, however, are close friends. Fenneko is edgy and frequently laughs at Haida, but she also knows him well, is supportive of him, and the pair genuinely spend time together. Fenneko may tease and Haida may whine, but they voluntarily spend their time together, in and out of work.

I am not sure whether I “ship” Fenneko and Haida, though. On the one hand, I do see them as the far better pair. They are real friends who genuinely like each other, even with their most annoying traits. I feel the best romances are those born from real friendship, rather than rom-com misunderstandings or “hate at first sight.” However, I also appreciate seeing such a strong bond between opposite-sex characters that does not require romance.

I overthink things.
body_abstract: Many fellow fans of Aggretsuko “ship” the main character, Retsuko, and her enamored co-worker, Haida. Personally, I do not.

summary:
GO FORTH AND DIE, SHITTY BOSS! 
Finally got around to finishing this bad boy! Crazy how it started as a 
simple sketch in my...
caption:
GO FORTH AND DIE, SHITTY BOSS!

Finally got around to finishing this bad boy! Crazy how it started as a simple sketch in my moleskine of Nathan Explosion and Retsuko.

Haida turned out to be a better bass player than Muderface.

The original sketch: https://the-beardly-ben.tumblr.com/post/173642879651/it-was-bound-to-happen-somebody-had-to-do-it-and

tags: sorry this is taking so long guys 😫😞
summary: I find it frustrating that I was able to throw together a class presentation and project in the span of just a few hours before...
body:
I find it frustrating that I was able to throw together a class presentation and project in the span of just a few hours before needing to turn it in, just for the sake of barely passing a class, yet I just procrastinate on fanfictions I actually WANT to tell.

The oddly amusing thing is both end with people telling me they liked my work, and I drive away to get some pizza, or some video games.

blog.name: idwsonicfan2018
blog.title: Welcome to my Tumblr blog, I guess.
blog.description:
Welcome to my dumb blog where I post some shit, including stuff about DuckTales 2017, Sonic The Hedgehog, Aggretsuko, DuckTales, Pokemon, SpongeBob, Hamtaro, Kirby, and Doraemon.
I like to occasionally tell fun facts or obscure trivia about stuff I know about.
(BY THE WAY: Tsunoda, Bijou, Dorami, and Webby are all precious girls who should be protected.)
My Fanfiction.Net Account (that was formally named JunichiNobuyoDoraemonMan) is now called KnockKnockIt'sKnuckles.

summary: Wow, the Tsunoda X Komiya ship is growing in popularity pretty fast ever since the Japanese exclusive Short #98 of the rare...
body:
Wow, the Tsunoda X Komiya ship is growing in popularity pretty fast ever since the Japanese exclusive Short #98 of the rare series of Aggretsuko shorts came out back in 2017.

Oh yeah, I don’t own all of these fanart of these two at all. They all belong to @ideserveavacation, @aggressive-retsukoing, @littlefaeriebottles, @xxtsuntsunxx, @strawberrymilk-arts, @nirvanillatte, and more on this site who are all talented at what they draw.
